Review_Text: We can red pill a lot of people with this well made doc. So glad my parents raised me with a tin foil hat instead of a silver spoon. My mom is actually who sent me this link to "A Thousand Pieces". I knew about these tortures since I was a teenager reading over my moms Cathy O'brien books. Dad was into studying the deep state, so i was given a well rounded healthy education since I can remember. If you haven't seen this film it is available on the internet and is a must view.

Review_title: This gets to the truth.. Just like JFK, DJT is a man the Cabal CAN'T Control.
Review_Text: JFK threatened to destroy the CIA. Trump promised to complete this task. This is why they News Mecia, Hollywood and the Democrat party have worked 24/7 to destroy him. When all is revealed, and it will happen when measures are installed to insure safety to all. People will demand the despicable group of evil beings pay in full for the murder, hate and chaos they've foisted on the world.

1000 pieces is an incredibly poignant revelation of a group of former government officials/patriots who were all targeted and persecuted by a core of Barry Soetoro officials. It is emotional but informative about the corruption that has occurred in the last 20 years. Anyone who cares how we got to where we are today; Should see this film.

Review_title: X Man Scores a Hat trick!
Review_Text: Until December 2019 I had no idea who John DaSouza was until the day Above Majestic was released. I soon found out, where the 'X' came from, yup X files, a family fav where I grew up down here in Australia. I had a mother who worked in Ufology regressing abductees, Psychic Readings, Ghosts, Whatever,,, It was all normal in our home from the 70's to date. So I knew when I saw Above Majestic, Cosmic Conspiracy, & A Thousand Pieces that I find found some 'kin'. So many of the things that I had experienced, witnessed or even heard of after the fact, corelate with many of the testimonies that come from John and Corey. In fact I was blessed to stumble on to the work you gentlemen produce. Many people may find current events 'too out there' to believe. But for me, I felt a lull in my quest for knowledge coming from a trusted source until now, now I have it, you guys challenge my mind and fill any questions I've been wanting answered, The reason I don't sit around picking at any 'Alien & Dark tales you tell is because - I've never met any of you. But I've experienced enough to know who is telling the truth in this 'Awakening" i will always follow both John and Corey, and of course the whole crew.. But Corey and John I feel a kinship for some reason.Brilliant movie, I'm glad I saw this page because it reminded me to pass the link on to my mum. She will love this movie & Oh how the tables have turned, as a kid she was the one handing out the red pills...God Bless All.
